8501 62736/CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_listen_socket_45.c memset 102
void CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_listen_socket_45_bad()
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )

void CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_listen_socket_45_bad()
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_listen_socket_45_badData = data;

8510 62735/CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_listen_socket_44.c socket 236
static void goodB2G()
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
funcPtr ( data );

8609 62451/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_53a.c socket 74
void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_53_bad()
wchar_t * data ;
wchar_t dataBuffer [ 100 ] = L ""
data = dataBuffer;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = wcslen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
0

8664 62554/CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_connect_socket_66a.c connect 81
void CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_connect_socket_66_bad()
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );

connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );

recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );

8718 62753/CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_listen_socket_82a.cpp socket 73
void bad()
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
baseObject -> action ( data );
void CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_listen_socket_82_bad::action(int data)
if ( data >= 0 )
buffer [ data ] = 1;
printIntLine ( buffer [ i ] );
void printIntLine (int intNumber)
printf ( "%d\n" , intNumber );
0

WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );

badSink ( data );

memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );

source [ 100 - 1 ] = L '\0'

void printWLine (const wchar_t * line)
if ( line != NULL )
wprintf ( L "%ls\n" , line )
free ( data );

if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );

8849 62711/CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_listen_socket_04.c socket 77
void CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_listen_socket_04_bad()
if ( STATIC_CONST_TRUE )
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
if ( data >= 0 )
buffer [ data ] = 1;
printIntLine ( buffer [ i ] );
void printIntLine (int intNumber)
printf ( "%d\n" , intNumber );

printWLine ( data );
void printWLine (const wchar_t * line)
if ( line != NULL )
wprintf ( L "%ls\n" , line )
free ( data );

9096 70458/CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_connect_socket_11.c free 133
void CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_connect_socket_11_bad()
int data ;
data = - 1;
if ( globalReturnsTrue ( ) )
int globalReturnsTrue()
return 1 ;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( globalReturnsTrue ( ) )
int globalReturnsTrue()
return 1 ;
int i ;
int * buffer = ( int * ) malloc ( 10 * sizeof ( int ) ) ;
for (i = 0; i < 10; i++)
buffer [ i ] = 0;
if ( data >= 0 )
buffer [ data ] = 1;
free ( buffer );
1

void CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_connect_socket_07_bad()
if ( staticFive == 5 )
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( connectSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( connectSocket );
if ( data >= 0 )
buffer [ data ] = 1;

if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )

service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( connectSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( connectSocket );
if ( data >= 0 )
buffer [ data ] = 1;
printIntLine ( buffer [ i ] );
void printIntLine (int intNumber)
printf ( "%d\n" , intNumber );
free ( buffer );
1

void bad()
char * data ;
char dataBuffer [ 100 ] = "" ;
data = dataBuffer;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = strlen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( char ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
data [ dataLen + recvResult / sizeof ( char ) ] = '\0';
replace = strchr ( data , '\r' );
if ( replace )
* replace = '\0';
replace = strchr ( data , '\n' );
if ( replace )
* replace = '\0';
while ( 0 )
if ( connectSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( connectSocket );

9237 62452/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_54a.c socket 74
void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_54_bad()
wchar_t * data ;
wchar_t dataBuffer [ 100 ] = L ""
data = dataBuffer;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = wcslen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );

9258 70672/CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_54a.c socket 72
void CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_54_bad()
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_54b_badSink ( data );
void CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_54b_badSink(int data)
CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_54c_badSink ( data );

CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_54d_badSink ( data );
void CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_54d_badSink(int data)

void CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_54e_badSink(int data)

9259 70672/CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_54a.c socket 170
static void goodB2G()
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );

9280 70676/CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_64a.c socket 72
void CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_64_bad()
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_64b_badSink ( & data );
void CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_64b_badSink(void * dataVoidPtr)

buffer [ data ] = 1;
printIntLine ( buffer [ i ] );

9423 62552/CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_connect_socket_64a.c connect 80
void CWE121_Stack_Based_Buffer_Overflow__CWE129_connect_socket_64_bad()
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )

service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );

WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;

if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';

void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_32_bad()
wchar_t * data ;
wchar_t * * dataPtr1 = & data ;
wchar_t dataBuffer [ 100 ] = L ""
data = dataBuffer;
wchar_t * data = * dataPtr1 ;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = wcslen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( connectSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( connectSocket );

9620 73421/CWE123_Write_What_Where_Condition__connect_socket_16.c socket 83
void CWE123_Write_What_Where_Condition__connect_socket_16_bad()
badStruct data ;
linkedList head = { & head , & head } ;
data . list . next = head . next;
data . list . prev = head . prev;
while ( 1 )
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , ( char * ) & data , sizeof ( data ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( connectSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( connectSocket );

void CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_22_bad()

int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )

if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_22_badSink ( data );
void CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__c_CWE129_listen_socket_22_badSink(int data)
if ( data >= 0 )
buffer [ data ] = 1;
printIntLine ( buffer [ i ] );
void printIntLine (int intNumber)
printf ( "%d\n" , intNumber );
free ( buffer );

9837 73535/CWE123_Write_What_Where_Condition__listen_socket_61b.c socket 75
void CWE123_Write_What_Where_Condition__listen_socket_61_bad()
badStruct data ;
linkedList head = { & head , & head } ;
data . list . next = head . next;
data . list . prev = head . prev;
data = CWE123_Write_What_Where_Condition__listen_socket_61b_badSource ( data );
badStruct CWE123_Write_What_Where_Condition__listen_socket_61b_badSource(badStruct data)
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );

if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )

if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );

recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );

if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );

service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );

recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , ( char * ) & data , sizeof ( data ) , 0 );

void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_listen_socket_01_bad()

char dataBuffer [ 100 ] = "" ;
data = dataBuffer;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = strlen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( char ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )

10231 62132/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_listen_socket_01.c socket 71
void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_listen_socket_01_bad()
char * data ;
char dataBuffer [ 100 ] = "" ;
data = dataBuffer;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = strlen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( char ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
data [ dataLen + recvResult / sizeof ( char ) ] = '\0';
replace = strchr ( data , '\r' );
if ( replace )
* replace = '\0';
replace = strchr ( data , '\n' );
if ( replace )
* replace = '\0';
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
hModule = LoadLibraryA ( data );
if ( hModule != NULL )
FreeLibrary ( hModule );

10282 73423/CWE123_Write_What_Where_Condition__connect_socket_18.c socket 83
void CWE123_Write_What_Where_Condition__connect_socket_18_bad()
badStruct data ;
linkedList head = { & head , & head } ;
data . list . next = head . next;
data . list . prev = head . prev;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , ( char * ) & data , sizeof ( data ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( connectSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( connectSocket );

10283 73423/CWE123_Write_What_Where_Condition__connect_socket_18.c recv 99
void CWE123_Write_What_Where_Condition__connect_socket_18_bad()
badStruct data ;
linkedList head = { & head , & head } ;
data . list . next = head . next;
data . list . prev = head . prev;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , ( char * ) & data , sizeof ( data ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )

void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_environment_18_bad()
wchar_t * data ;

if ( environment != NULL )
wcsncat ( data + dataLen , environment , 100 - dataLen - 1 );
HMODULE hModule ;
hModule = LoadLibraryW ( data );
if ( hModule != NULL )
FreeLibrary ( hModule );

data [ 50 - 1 ] = L '\0'

void CWE124_Buffer_Underwrite__CWE839_connect_socket_06_bad()
if ( STATIC_CONST_FIVE == 5 )
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )

void CWE124_Buffer_Underwrite__CWE839_connect_socket_06_bad()
if ( STATIC_CONST_FIVE == 5 )
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( connectSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( connectSocket );
if ( data < 10 )

void CWE124_Buffer_Underwrite__CWE839_connect_socket_03_bad()
if ( 5 == 5 )
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( data < 10 )
buffer [ data ] = 1;
printIntLine ( buffer [ i ] );

static char * badSource(char * data)
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = strlen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( char ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )

data [ dataLen + recvResult / sizeof ( char ) ] = '\0';
replace = strchr ( data , '\r' );
if ( replace )
* replace = '\0';
replace = strchr ( data , '\n' );
if ( replace )
* replace = '\0';

10876 67758/CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__cpp_CWE129_listen_socket_83_bad.cpp memset 74
CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__cpp_CWE129_listen_socket_83_bad::CWE122_Heap_Based_Buffer_Overflow__cpp_CWE129_listen_socket_83_bad(int dataCopy)
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
0

WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );

* p ++ = 30;

temp = "LL.MIT.EDU";

* p ++ = * temp ++;
* p ++ = 0;
* p ++ = 16;
* p ++ = 0;
* p ++ = 1;

len += strlen ( temp );

* p ++ = * temp ++;
len += 11;
temp = "This is random junk in the TXT record that will overflow (*rr)->rr_u.rr_txt";
len += strlen ( temp );
for(i=0; i<len; i++, p++)

* p ++ = 0;
* p ++ = 16;
* p ++ = 0;
* p ++ = 1;
* p ++ = 0;
* p ++ = 0;
* p ++ = 0;
* p ++ = 255;
* p ++ = 0;

* p ++ = 30;

11057 73550/CWE124_Buffer_Underwrite__CWE839_connect_socket_01.c socket 68
void CWE124_Buffer_Underwrite__CWE839_connect_socket_01_bad()
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( connectSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( connectSocket );
if ( data < 10 )
buffer [ data ] = 1;
printIntLine ( buffer [ i ] );

printf ( "%d\n" , intNumber );

service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );

acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )

11274 62179/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_listen_socket_84_bad.cpp LoadLibraryA 135
void bad()
char * data ;
char dataBuffer [ 100 ] = "" ;
data = dataBuffer;
CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_listen_socket_84_bad * badObject = new CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_listen_socket_84_bad ( data ) ;
CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_listen_socket_84_bad::CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_listen_socket_84_bad(char * dataCopy)
data = dataCopy;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int wsaDataInit = 0 ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char * replace ;
SOCKET listenSocket = INVALID_SOCKET ;
SOCKET acceptSocket = INVALID_SOCKET ;
size_t dataLen = strlen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
break ;
wsaDataInit = 1;
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
break ;
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
break ;
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
break ;
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
break ;
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( char ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
break ;
data [ dataLen + recvResult / sizeof ( char ) ] = '\0';
replace = strchr ( data , '\r' );
if ( replace )
* replace = '\0';
replace = strchr ( data , '\n' );
if ( replace )
* replace = '\0';
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
if ( wsaDataInit )
WSACleanup ( );
delete badObject

FreeLibrary ( hModule );

recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( char ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
data [ dataLen + recvResult / sizeof ( char ) ] = '\0';
while ( 0 )
myStruct . structFirst = data;

11285 62171/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_listen_socket_67a.c recv 103
void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_listen_socket_67_bad()
char * data ;
char dataBuffer [ 100 ] = "" ;
data = dataBuffer;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = strlen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( char ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
data [ dataLen + recvResult / sizeof ( char ) ] = '\0';
replace = strchr ( data , '\r' );
if ( replace )
* replace = '\0';
replace = strchr ( data , '\n' );
if ( replace )
* replace = '\0';
while ( 0 )
myStruct . structFirst = data;

dest [ 50 - 1 ] = '\0';

if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );

if ( globalReturnsTrue ( ) )
int globalReturnsTrue()
return 1 ;

data [ dataLen - 1 ] = '\0';
data [ dataLen ] = '\0';

void bad()

struct sockaddr_in service ;

if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );

11741 62448/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_45.c socket 94
void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_45_bad()
wchar_t * data ;
wchar_t dataBuffer [ 100 ] = L ""
data = dataBuffer;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = wcslen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
0
------------------------------
11742 62448/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_45.c LoadLibraryW 55
static void badSink()
wchar_t * data = CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_45_badData ;
HMODULE hModule ;
hModule = LoadLibraryW ( data );

11755 62440/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_31.c socket 71
void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_31_bad()
wchar_t * data ;
wchar_t dataBuffer [ 100 ] = L ""
data = dataBuffer;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = wcslen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );

11781 62255/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_44.c socket 91
void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_44_bad()
wchar_t * data ;
data = dataBuffer;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = wcslen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( connectSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( connectSocket );
0

11839 73719/CWE124_Buffer_Underwrite__CWE839_listen_socket_42.c memset 71
static int badSource(int data)
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
0

11841 73719/CWE124_Buffer_Underwrite__CWE839_listen_socket_42.c socket 66
static int badSource(int data)
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';
data = atoi ( inputBuffer );
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
return data ;

11931 62443/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_34.c socket 78
void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_34_bad()
wchar_t * data ;
wchar_t dataBuffer [ 100 ] = L ""
data = dataBuffer;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = wcslen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
0

listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );

if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );

inputBuffer [ recvResult ] = '\0';

struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )

12156 62466/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_83_bad.cpp socket 69
CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_83_bad::CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_83_bad(wchar_t * dataCopy)
data = dataCopy;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = wcslen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );
0

void bad()

data = dataBuffer;
CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_84_bad * badObject = new CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_84_bad ( data ) ;
CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_84_bad::CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_84_bad(wchar_t * dataCopy)
data = dataCopy;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = wcslen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( connectSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( connectSocket );

12246 62275/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_84_bad.cpp LoadLibraryW 123
void bad()
wchar_t * data ;
wchar_t dataBuffer [ 100 ] = L ""
data = dataBuffer;
CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_84_bad * badObject = new CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_84_bad ( data ) ;
CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_84_bad::CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_84_bad(wchar_t * dataCopy)
data = dataCopy;
WSADATA wsaData ;
int wsaDataInit = 0 ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
wchar_t * replace ;
SOCKET connectSocket = INVALID_SOCKET ;
size_t dataLen = wcslen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
break ;
wsaDataInit = 1;
connectSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( connectSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
break ;
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
break ;
recvResult = recv ( connectSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
break ;
data [ dataLen + recvResult / sizeof ( wchar_t ) ] = L '\0'
replace = wcschr ( data , L '\r' )
if ( replace )
* replace = L '\0'
replace = wcschr ( data , L '\n' )
if ( replace )
* replace = L '\0'
while ( 0 )
if ( connectSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( connectSocket );
if ( wsaDataInit )
WSACleanup ( );
delete badObject
CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_84_bad::~CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_connect_socket_84_bad()
HMODULE hModule ;
hModule = LoadLibraryW ( data );
if ( hModule != NULL )
FreeLibrary ( hModule );

if ( connect ( connectSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )

while ( 0 )

WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
char inputBuffer [ CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE ] ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , inputBuffer , CHAR_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )

service . sin_addr . s_addr = inet_addr ( IP_ADDRESS );
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );

12503 62428/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_09.c socket 73
void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_wchar_t_listen_socket_09_bad()
wchar_t * data ;
wchar_t dataBuffer [ 100 ] = L ""
data = dataBuffer;
if ( GLOBAL_CONST_TRUE )
WSADATA wsaData ;
int recvResult ;
struct sockaddr_in service ;
size_t dataLen = wcslen ( data ) ;
if ( WSAStartup ( MAKEWORD ( 2 , 2 ) , & wsaData ) != NO_ERROR )
listenSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , IPPROTO_TCP );
if ( listenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
memset ( & service , 0 , sizeof ( service ) );
service . sin_family = AF_INET;
service . sin_addr . s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
service . sin_port = htons ( TCP_PORT );
if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
while ( 0 )
if ( listenSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( listenSocket );
if ( acceptSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
CLOSE_SOCKET ( acceptSocket );

if ( bind ( listenSocket , ( struct sockaddr * ) & service , sizeof ( service ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
if ( listen ( listenSocket , LISTEN_BACKLOG ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
acceptSocket = accept ( listenSocket , NULL , NULL );
if ( acceptSocket == SOCKET_ERROR )
recvResult = recv ( acceptSocket , ( char * ) ( data + dataLen ) , sizeof ( wchar_t ) * ( 100 - dataLen - 1 ) , 0 );
if ( recvResult == SOCKET_ERROR || recvResult == 0 )
data [ dataLen + recvResult / sizeof ( wchar_t ) ] = L '\0'
while ( 0 )
HMODULE hModule ;
hModule = LoadLibraryW ( data );
if ( hModule != NULL )
FreeLibrary ( hModule );
1

dataGoodBuffer [ 50 - 1 ] = '\0';
data = ( void * ) dataGoodBuffer;
myUnion . unionFirst = data;
void * data = myUnion . unionSecond ;
size_t dataLen = strlen ( ( char * ) data ) ;
void * dest = ( void * ) calloc ( dataLen + 1 , 1 ) ;
memcpy ( dest , data , ( dataLen + 1 ) );
printLine ( ( char * ) dest );
void printLine (const char * line)
if ( line != NULL )
printf ( "%s\n" , line );
free ( dest );
0

12817 62021/CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_console_61b.c strlen 29
void CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_console_61_bad()

data = dataBuffer;
data = CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_console_61b_badSource ( data );
char * CWE114_Process_Control__w32_char_console_61b_badSource(char * data)
size_t dataLen = strlen ( data ) ;
if ( 100 - dataLen > 1 )
if ( fgets ( data + dataLen , ( int ) ( 100 - dataLen ) , stdin ) != NULL )
dataLen = strlen ( data );
if ( dataLen > 0 && data [ dataLen - 1 ] == '\n' )
data [ dataLen - 1 ] = '\0';
data [ dataLen ] = '\0';
return data ;
